words.sentence: Het is geinig om te lachen.
Op de mark is veel concurrentie.
words.sentence_translated: There's a lot of competition at the market.

words.sentence: Het college was saai en moeilijk.
words.sentence_translated: The lecture was boring and difficult.

words.sentence: De mark is veilig voor kinderen.
words.sentence_translated: The market is safe for children.

words.sentence: Het boek valt op de grond.
words.sentence_translated: The book falls to the ground.

words.sentence: Hij werkt hard om veilig te zijn.
words.sentence_translated: He works hard to be safe.
A trivia question can be boring.

words.sentence: We hebben interessante gesprekken op de mark.
words.sentence_translated: We have interesting conversations at the market.
